metadataAttributes.Title: Leading and Developing Top Talent
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course offers seasoned and up-and-coming leaders a clear, concise overview of hiring for team culture, the concepts and practices of building a productive environment for remote and hybrid teams, and leading organizational strategies, which begins with developing a strategic plan, creating SMART goals, and determining the most critical key performance indicators or metrics to manage and measure the plan’s success. Studies have shown that leading and developing talent includes creating a culture of diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging. As a result, this course provides strategies for identifying, attracting, and retaining a diverse team of employees. Finally, the course includes best practices for coaching and mentoring based on a partnership that provides support and challenging opportunities to employees.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Attract and retain a diverse team of employees,Increase collaboration by implementing strategies for team performance,Understand the purpose and importance of developing a team culture,Promote effective communication for both individuals and group members,Ensure accountability to diversity and inclusion efforts for a sense of belonging,
